title: Taylor Rooks on NBA Player-Media Relations, Betting in the Bubble, and More | Real Ones
description:
Bleacher Report’s Taylor Rooks joins Logan and Raja to talk about the emotional highs and lows of the NBA bubble (1:00), how she approaches relationship-building with NBA players as a member of the media (21:30), and gives her Real One of the Week (42:00).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Taylor Rooks
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
